LanguageData.WFFT_NeedsWater: Fish traps and nets must be built on water
LanguageData.WFFT_NeedsDistance: Fish traps and nets must be built with at least 10 tiles of separation of each other
LanguageData.WFFT_SpawnIntervalToolTip: Value in ticks, 60000 ticks is equal to one day in game
LanguageData.WFFT_DmgInterval: Mean time between trap receiving damage:
LanguageData.WFFT_DmgIntervalToolTip: Higher value means longer time between damage
